description: Ministry of Water Supply & Drainage - A/L in Nawala, Sri Jayawardanapura Kotte D/S Division, Colombo District for the access road to the land where the Nawala increasing Pump House is to be constructed. A/L in Kahatawila, Dankotuwa D/S Division, Puttlam District for the constructions of a Pressure Blanching Tank under the Dankotuwa Intergrated W.S.Project. A/L in Sirigampola North D/S/D Wennappuwa Puttlam Dist. for the constructions of a Water Tower under the Dankotuwa Intergrated W.S. Project. A/L in Ulapane Janapadaya, Ganga Ihala Korale D/S Division, Kandy District for the constructions of a Water Tank for Ulapanawatta W.S. scheme of Kandy South W.S.Project
